text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/biologicallyderivedproductdispense-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
preparation PreparationThe dispense process has started but not yet completed.
in-progress In ProgressThe dispense process is in progress.
allocated AllocatedThe requested product has been allocated and is ready for transport.
issued IssuedThe dispensed product has been picked up.
unfulfilled UnfulfilledThe dispense could not be completed.
returned ReturnedThe dispensed product was returned.
entered-in-error Entered in ErrorThe dispense was entered in error and therefore nullified.
unknown UnknownThe authoring system does not know which of the status values applies for this dispense. Note: this concept is not to be used for other - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, it's just not known which one.

concept.definition: The dispense process has started but not yet completed.
The dispense process is in progress.
The requested product has been allocated and is ready for transport.
The dispensed product has been picked up.
The dispense could not be completed.
The dispense was entered in error and therefore nullified.

The authoring system does not know which of the status values applies for this dispense. Note: this concept is not to be used for other - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, it's just not known which one.
